titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress with respect to fishing licenses for senior citizens.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Referred to Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment.

committee.subcommittee: Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment
committee.name: House Merchant Marine and Fisheries

bill.summary: 10/14/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that any person aged 65 or older should be able to fish in any State without the purchase of a license.
